A: from 2015-16, people who had a common cold Corona infection at least 3 months before, 65 samples
C: from patients in the hospital, all Sars-CoV positive and symptomatic at different stages post symptom onset; currently roughly 150 analyzed, sampling ongoing
K: childrens study Heidelberg, roughly 1100 samples, sampling ongoing (goal 3300)
M: from 2020, not tested for RNA or negative, roughly 150 samples, sampling ongoing
P: recovered from Sars-CoV infection, roughly 150 samples, sampling ongoing
X: from before 2018, patients with mycoplasma infection
